languages.text: "Право судить даровано Богом-Императором. Прямо сейчас вы можете поклясться, что лишь Лекс Империалис ведет вас, а не чужой умысел?"
"The right to judge is granted by the God-Emperor. Can you swear that at this moment you are guided by the Lex Imperialis and not someone else's intent?"
languages.original_text: "Право судить даровано Богом-Императором. Прямо сейчас вы можете поклясться, что лишь Лекс Империалис ведет вас, а не чужой умысел?"

traits.locale_text: "The right to judge is granted by the God-Emperor. Can you swear that at this moment you are guided by the Lex Imperialis and not someone else's intent?"
"The right to judge is granted by the God-Emperor. Can you swear that at this moment you are guided by the Lex Imperialis and not someone else's intent?"
"The right to judge is granted by the God-Emperor. Can you swear that at this moment you are guided by the Lex Imperialis and not someone else's intent?"
"The right to judge is granted by the God-Emperor. Can you swear that at this moment you are guided by the Lex Imperialis and not someone else's intent?"
"The right to judge is granted by the God-Emperor. Can you swear that at this moment you are guided by the Lex Imperialis and not someone else's intent?"
"The right to judge is granted by the God-Emperor. Can you swear that at this moment you are guided by the Lex Imperialis and not someone else's intent?"

languages.text: «Es el Dios Emperador quien otorga el derecho a juzgar. ¿Puede jurar que ahora mismo le guía únicamente la Lex Imperialis, libre de los propósitos de otras personas?».
languages.original_text: "The right to judge is granted by the God-Emperor. Can you swear that at this moment you are guided by the Lex Imperialis and not someone else's intent?"

traits.locale_text: «Es el Dios Emperador quien otorga el derecho a juzgar. ¿Puede jurar que ahora mismo le guía únicamente la Lex Imperialis, libre de los propósitos de otras personas?».

languages.text: “你手中的审判权是神皇赐予你的。你敢发誓你此时此刻遵从的是帝国律法，而不是其他什么人的意愿吗？”
languages.original_text: "The right to judge is granted by the God-Emperor. Can you swear that at this moment you are guided by the Lex Imperialis and not someone else's intent?"

traits.locale_text: “你手中的审判权是神皇赐予你的。你敢发誓你此时此刻遵从的是帝国律法，而不是其他什么人的意愿吗？”

languages.text: 「裁きを下す権利は神帝陛下から与えられている。今この瞬間、君はレックス・インペリアに従っていて、他者の意思に従ってはいないと誓えるか？」
languages.original_text: "The right to judge is granted by the God-Emperor. Can you swear that at this moment you are guided by the Lex Imperialis and not someone else's intent?"

traits.locale_text: 「裁きを下す権利は神帝陛下から与えられている。今この瞬間、君はレックス・インペリアに従っていて、他者の意思に従ってはいないと誓えるか？」

languages.text: "Das Recht, zu urteilen, wird vom Gottimperator gewährt. Könnt Ihr schwören, dass Ihr in diesem Moment vom Lex Imperia geleitet werdet und nicht von den Absichten eines anderen?"
languages.original_text: "The right to judge is granted by the God-Emperor. Can you swear that at this moment you are guided by the Lex Imperialis and not someone else's intent?"

traits.locale_text: "Das Recht, zu urteilen, wird vom Gottimperator gewährt. Könnt Ihr schwören, dass Ihr in diesem Moment vom Lex Imperia geleitet werdet und nicht von den Absichten eines anderen?"

languages.text: "Yargılama hakkını bahşeden Tanrı İmparator'dur. Şu anda Lex İmperialis tarafından yönlendirildiğine ve başkasının emellerine hizmet etmediğine yemin edebilir misin?"
languages.original_text: "The right to judge is granted by the God-Emperor. Can you swear that at this moment you are guided by the Lex Imperialis and not someone else's intent?"

traits.locale_text: "Yargılama hakkını bahşeden Tanrı İmparator'dur. Şu anda Lex İmperialis tarafından yönlendirildiğine ve başkasının emellerine hizmet etmediğine yemin edebilir misin?"

languages.text: « Le droit de juger est un privilège accordé par l'Empereur-Dieu. Pouvez-vous jurer que c'est bien la Lex Imperialis qui guide vos actes en cet instant, et non les intérêts d'une tierce partie ? »
languages.original_text: "The right to judge is granted by the God-Emperor. Can you swear that at this moment you are guided by the Lex Imperialis and not someone else's intent?"

traits.locale_text: « Le droit de juger est un privilège accordé par l'Empereur-Dieu. Pouvez-vous jurer que c'est bien la Lex Imperialis qui guide vos actes en cet instant, et non les intérêts d'une tierce partie ? »
